dokku.predeploy: bundle exec rails db:migrate && bundle exec rake assets:precompile
dokku.postdeploy: if [ -n "$DISCORD_WEBHOOK_URL" ]; then JSON_STRING="{\"content\":\"SHA [$GIT_REV](https://github.com/jcraigk/phishin/commit/$GIT_REV) successfully deployed to https://phish.in\"}"; curl -X POST -H 'Content-Type: application/json' --data "$JSON_STRING" $DISCORD_WEBHOOK_URL; fi
